string.name: permgrouplab_health
string.description: Title of an application permission group, listed so the user can choose whether they want to allow the application to do this. [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: health_permission_header_description
string.description: Description text shown on screen for managing which apps have access to health and fitness data. Note: Health, fitness and wellness is the brand [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Apps with this permission can read and write your health, fitness and wellness data. This includes data tracked from your devices and data stored in Health Connect

string.name: request_fitness_permissions_header_title
string.description: Title for screen to give permissions to an app to read or write users data. Note: Fitness and wellness is the brand. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Allow %1$s to access your fitness and wellness data?

string.name: request_fitness_permissions_data_access_type_read_write
string.description: Text asking the user to select permissions for an app. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Choose which fitness and wellness data this app can access. This includes data tracked and stored on this device, %1$s

string.name: request_fitness_permissions_data_access_type_read
string.description: Text asking the user to select permissions for an app. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Choose which fitness and wellness data this app can access. This includes data tracked and stored on this device, %1$s

string.name: request_fitness_permissions_data_access_type_write
string.description: Text asking the user to select permissions for an app. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Choose which fitness and wellness data this app can access. This includes data tracked and stored on this device, %1$s

string.name: request_learn_more
string.description: Link to a help page about fitness and wellness permissions request. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: health_fitness_permissions_learn_more_link
string.description: Link that helps to learn more about Health Connect. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: settings_manage_permission
string.description: Label for manage permissions in Settings. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: settings_combined_permissions
string.description: Label for view detailed fitness and medical permissions in Settings. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: settings_fitness_permissions
string.description: Label for view detailed fitness permissions in Settings. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: settings_medical_permissions
string.description: Label for view detailed medical permissions in Settings. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]
